title: ENERLITES 20 Amp Toggle Light Switch, 3-Way or Single Pole, 20A 120/277V, Grounding Screw, Heavy Duty Commercial Grade, UL Listed, 83201-W, White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #61,056 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)  #206 in Electrical Light Switches

description: The ENERLITES 83201 3-way toggle switch is a 20A replacement for any commercial grade wall switch. This toggle light switch is easy to install and it is compatible in either single pole or 3-way installations. This expands the range of potential applications, allowing the toggle switch to be installed in 3-way configurations in which a single load is controlled from two separate locations. The wall switch is made from high-quality Polycarbonate Thermoplastic material for high resistance to heat and impacts, and the metal components are made from solid steel. These materials are virtually indestructible, making the switch ideal for longevity in physically demanding applications. This 20A electrical switch is ideal for commercial locations such as schools, stores, restaurants, hotels, and more. It can also be used in residential locations that may require the use of 20A switches for high-power appliances. This light switch is white, but the device is available in a range of unique colors to match virtually any location. Wiring instructions are included. This product is UL listed and includes a one-year warranty.
shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Commercial grade ON/OFF toggle switch with shallow body design to fit standard junction boxes; replaces any 1-gang wall switch; push-in and side wiring (copper only); break-off plaster ears
Made from impact-resistant Polycarbonate Thermoplastic with solid steel components; frame dimensions: 3.65” H x 1.30” W x 0.90” D
Suitable for commercial locations such as offices, schools, stores, shops, restaurants, public facilities, and hotels, as well as residential areas that require 20A switches
For the best fit and color match, always use ENERLITES wall plates such as the 8811-W, 8811M-W, or 8811O-W toggle switch covers

White; 20A, 120V/277 VAC, 3-way or single pole; option of back wiring (#10-#14 AWG) or side wiring (#12-#14 AWG); self-grounding; break-off plaster yoke tabs; wiring instructions included; UL-listed; 1-year warranty

customers_say: Customers find the toggle switch well-constructed and easy to install, with one mentioning it's a quick 5-minute swap. They appreciate its functionality, and one customer notes its nice weight to the on-off action.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSeems to be a quality switch.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Heavy enough to seem like it will last. Switch operation is quiet and feels right.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works fine, quality is ok.  Only negative was the upper and lower support tabs are smaller than other brands I have used.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Had a light switch that would no longer toggle.  Matched the specs from the installed unit after turning off the circuit breaker and checking for line voltage. Easy 5 minute swap out.  Applied the electrical tape as recommended by an electrician colleague. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIt’s well-made can do the job.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I ordered this switch as I needed a heavy duty one. It easily handled the load I put on it.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsJust what I hoped for
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Easy to install and has a nice “weight” to the on-off action.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: If you are like me, living in a remanufactured mobile home; you know about those cheap enclosed receptacles and light switches.That's when I decided to update light switches to 4 way light switches 15 or 20 amps.Yes, I resized and cut  the holes in the drywall according to the width of either the one or double gang box.So many wires hooked up, that's when I called a licensed electrician to do the wiring. It wasn't expensive at all if you do the drywall work yourself.It's worth it. Never have to get annoyed with cheap enclosed light switches.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I like the fact that it has an extra connecting feature.
